name: Materia Ex Vita
description:
Materia Ex Vita is a space combat/simulation game. It features a large simulated galaxy with thousands of playable worlds and space stations for you to cause mischief on!

Support us on Patreon at: https://www.patreon.com/materiaexvita

Join us on discord for more news: https://discord.gg/B8GyynF
